titleStmt.title: An Abstract of the present state of the mines of Bwlchyr-Eskir-Hyr and of the material proceedings of the committee, appointed for the management thereof, published for the information and satisfaction of the absent-partners, and at their request.

notesStmt.note: "To the absent partners" dated and signed: Jan. 31st, 1699/1700, Francis Pigott, Sec.
